RedText.Name: POP POP!
RedText.Effect: Deals Crit Damage twice.

RedText.Name: I never freeze
RedText.Effect: Adds Cryo Element type.

RedText.Name: Toasty!
RedText.Effect: Adds Incendiary Element type.

RedText.Name: Was he slow?
RedText.Effect: Fires backwards.

RedText.Name: We Hate You, Please Die.
RedText.Effect: Taunts the farthest Enemy each turn.

RedText.Name: Tell them they're next
RedText.Effect: Won't deal Damage to the final Enemy in an encounter.

RedText.Name: PAN SHOT!
RedText.Effect: Always Hits the closest Enemy.

RedText.Name: Envision Wyverns
RedText.Effect: Adds Radiation Element type.

RedText.Name: I'm melting!
RedText.Effect: Adds Corrosive Element type.

RedText.Name: The same thing that happens to everything else.
RedText.Effect: Adds Shock Element type.

RedText.Name: 360 quickscope
RedText.Effect: Adds a Crit to each Ranged Attack.

RedText.Name: Any Questions?
RedText.Effect: Shoots pumpkin bombs that deal an extra 3d6 Explosive Damage.

RedText.Name: Blood and Thunder
RedText.Effect: Take 1d6 Health Damage to deal +3d6 Shock Damage.

RedText.Name: SI VIS PACEM, PARA BELLUM
RedText.Effect: Gain Extra Attack if Acting Before Enemies.

RedText.Name: You're breathtaking!
RedText.Effect: Wielder cannot be targeted on the first turn of an encounter.

RedText.Name: Pass turn.
RedText.Effect: Wielder may Throw a grenade during the End of Turn step.

RedText.Name: I am Vengeance!
RedText.Effect: Deals 2x Damage to Enemies adjacent to allies.

RedText.Name: Roll the dice
RedText.Effect: If Accuracy Roll is even, 2x Damage. If Accuracy Roll is odd, half Damage.

RedText.Name: One among the fence
RedText.Effect: Add 21 Damage if you roll 13+ on your Accuracy Roll. (1/day)

RedText.Name: Don't be sorry. Be better.
RedText.Effect: Reroll the Badass Die once per day.

RedText.Name: THE PICKLES!
RedText.Effect: Shoots flaming cheeseburgers that deal an extra 2d6 Incendiary Damage.

RedText.Name: Do a kickflip!
RedText.Effect: +4 on Traverse Checks while equipped.

RedText.Name: Extinction is the Rule
RedText.Effect: Teleport to any square up to 4 away when you kill an Enemy.

RedText.Name: Never Fight a Knight with a Perm
RedText.Effect: DMG Mod +6 against non-human Enemies.

RedText.Name: Bye bye, little Butt Stallion!
RedText.Effect: Shots explode into rainbows that deal an extra 1d8 Damage.

RedText.Name: Time 2 Hack
RedText.Effect: +4 on Interact Checks and Melee Damage while equipped.

RedText.Name: HATE Magic. so much
RedText.Effect: +3 DMG Mod. Take 2d6 Vomit Damage if Reloaded.

RedText.Name: OFF WITH THEIR HEADS!
RedText.Effect: Roll %s. 95%+: the Enemy's head falls off.

RedText.Name: This is my BOOMSTICK!
RedText.Effect: Deals 3x Damage to skeletons.

RedText.Name: Super easy, barely an inconvenience
RedText.Effect: Automatically pass the first Check each day.

RedText.Name: Hold onto your butts.
RedText.Effect: When fired, the wielder and targets Hit are Knocked Back 2 squares.

RedText.Name: The Wise Man's Fear
RedText.Effect: Deals 3x Damage to all wizards.

RedText.Name: I don't want this isolation.
RedText.Effect: Won't fire unless adjacent to an ally or target.

RedText.Name: TUFF with two Fs
RedText.Effect: Prevents the first 5 Health Damage each turn.

RedText.Name: Unlikely Maths
RedText.Effect: Roll an extra die of each type rolled during an Attack and take the highest result(s).

RedText.Name: Gravity's Rainbow
RedText.Effect: First Attack against a Badass target always deals max Damage.

RedText.Name: Let's do this one last time
RedText.Effect: Shoots webs that reduce target's Movement to 0 for 1 turn.

RedText.Name: BIP!
RedText.Effect: Once per encounter, the wielder can run into squares with an Enemy, Knocking them Back 1 square.

RedText.Name: Heaviest Matter of the Universe
RedText.Effect: The wielder and targets Hit cannot take Movement Actions.

RedText.Name: GREEN FLAME
RedText.Effect: Shoots burst of green flames while firing. dealing 2d6 Incendiary Damage to adjacent targets.

RedText.Name: More like Bore Ragnarok!
RedText.Effect: Gain 1 Badass Token after a successful Talk Check while equipped.

RedText.Name: That's levitation, Holmes!
RedText.Effect: Ignore difficult terrain while equipped.

RedText.Name: Let's boo-boo.
RedText.Effect: Gain Extra Movement after drinking a potion while equipped.

RedText.Name: Mmm Whatcha Say.
RedText.Effect: Gain a Ranged Attack if an Enemy is talking before an encounter.

RedText.Name: Here Comes the FunCooker
RedText.Effect: On a Crit, the Enemy suffers a miniature combustion, dealing 1d12 Explosive Full Splash Damage.

RedText.Name: Overwhelming strength is boring.
RedText.Effect: -6 Initiative. The first non-Badass, non- boss Enemy that is Melee Attacked dies instantly (1/day).

RedText.Name: Stop talking, I will win. It's what heroes do.
RedText.Effect: Gun fires explosives that deal +3d6 Damage to adjacent squares.

RedText.Name: Richer and cleverer than everyone else!
RedText.Effect: Add 10 gold per Loot Pile when rolling for Enemy Drops.

RedText.Name: METAL WILL DESTROY ALL EVIL!
RedText.Effect: Allies get +2 ACC Mod each turn you perform a Melee Attack.

RedText.Name: Life is a conundrum of esoterica.
RedText.Effect: Gain 2 Badass Tokens the first time you roll for a Trauma each day.
